AT.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
AT.description: Mario präsentiert ein ganz neues Ballspiel! - Magischer Touch: Es gibt viele Basketball-Spiele da draußen. Aber keines davon verfügt über eine so grandiose Steuerung wie Mario Slam Basketball. Mit dem Touchpen wird gedribbelt, gepasst und geworfen. - Die Spieler wählen die drei Charaktere ihrer Teams aus dem Mario-Universum aus. Power-ups wie Rote Panzer und Bob-Ombs können den Spielverlauf verändern, da sie den Punktestand beeinflussen. Die Spieler sollten auf dem Weg zum Korb so viele wie möglich davon sammeln. Dieses Spiel unterstützt auch Japanisch.

AU.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
AU.description: It’s a whole new ball game as Mario rocks the rim! - Get that magic touch. There are plenty of basketball games out there, but none with the hands-on control of Mario Slam Basketball. Players use the touch screen to get their game on as they execute tricky dribbles, special passes and sweet shots – all with strokes and taps of the stylus. - Players choose their teams of three characters from the Mario universe and hit the parquet. Power-ups like Red Shells and Bob-ombs can turn the tide as they chase down coins – they will affect the score, so players collect as many as they can as they drive to the hoop. This game also supports Japanese.

BG.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
BG.description: It’s a whole new ball game as Mario rocks the rim! - Get that magic touch. There are plenty of basketball games out there, but none with the hands-on control of Mario Slam Basketball. Players use the touch screen to get their game on as they execute tricky dribbles, special passes and sweet shots – all with strokes and taps of the stylus. - Players choose their teams of three characters from the Mario universe and hit the parquet. Power-ups like Red Shells and Bob-ombs can turn the tide as they chase down coins – they will affect the score, so players collect as many as they can as they drive to the hoop. This game also supports Japanese.

BE.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
BE.description: Lorsque Mario se lance dans un jeu de basket, on peut s'attendre à quelques légers changements de règles. - Un bon doigté. Les jeux de basket-ball sont nombreux mais aucun un contrôle manuel digne de celui de Mario Slam Basketball. Le joueur se sert de l'écran tactile pour réaliser des dribbles, des passes spéciales et les lancers les plus spectaculaires, le tout à l'aide du stylet. - Le joueur sélectionne ses équipes de trois personnages de l'univers Mario avant de se lancer sur le terrain. Les carapaces rouges ou les bombes peuvent créer des retournements de situations à tout moment. Le joueur doit également collecter un maximum de pièces avant de marquer car elles peuvent largement influencer le score. Vous pouvez également jouer à ce jeu en japonais.

ES.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
ES.description: ¡Un concepto totalmente nuevo de juego de baloncesto llega rebotando de la mano de Mario! - Consigue el toque mágico. Hay un montón de juegos de basket en el mercado, pero ninguno con la forma de control de Mario Slam Basketball. Los jugadores utilizan la pantalla táctil para intentar ganar el partido mientras realizan vistosas fintas, pases especiales y suaves tiros a canasta; todo ello con toques del lápiz. - Los jugadores escogen los tres componentes de su equipo entre el amplio abanico de personajes del universo Mario y saltan al parquet. Poderes especiales como Conchas Rojas o Bob-ombas pueden cambiar el curso del encuentro al convertirse en monedas que afectan al marcador, así que los jugadores intentarán coger todas las que puedan mientras se desenvuelven en la cancha. Este juego también está disponible en japonés.

IT.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
IT.description: Mario e la sua allegra banda di amici sono pronti a emulare i più grandi campioni di basket in Mario Slam Basketball! - Il tocco è la chiave. Ci sono tanti giochi di basket in giro, ma nessuno come Mario Slam Basketball. I giocatori usano il touch screen per eseguire mosse, passaggi e colpi, il tutto eseguito grazie al pennino. - I giocatori scelgono la propria squadra di tre giocatori dall'universo di Mario. I power-up come Gusci Rossi e Bo-bombe possono cambiare il volto di una partita, influenzandone il punteggio. Il gioco è disponibile anche in giapponese.

NL.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
NL.description: Laat Mario maar dribbelen! - Zorg dat je die 'magische touch' te pakken krijgt. Er zijn genoeg basketballspellen, maar geen ervan heeft de hands-on besturing van Mario Slam Basketball. Spelers gebruiken het Touch Screen om knappe dribbels, speciale passes en schitterende shots te maken, door het gebruik van de stylus. - Spelers kiezen hun teams van drie personages uit het rijk van Mario en springen het veld op. Power-ups zoals Red Shells en Bob-ombs kunnen de bal anders laten rollen als ze op muntjes jagen - ze beïnvloeden de score, dus spelers verzamelen er zoveel als ze kunnen op hun koers naar de basket. Deze game ondersteunt ook Japans.

NZ.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
NZ.description: It’s a whole new ball game as Mario rocks the rim! - Get that magic touch. There are plenty of basketball games out there, but none with the hands-on control of Mario Slam Basketball. Players use the touch screen to get their game on as they execute tricky dribbles, special passes and sweet shots – all with strokes and taps of the stylus. - Players choose their teams of three characters from the Mario universe and hit the parquet. Power-ups like Red Shells and Bob-ombs can turn the tide as they chase down coins – they will affect the score, so players collect as many as they can as they drive to the hoop. This game also supports Japanese.

PT.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
PT.description: É um jogo de bola completamente novo quando o Mario enfia a bola no cesto! - Consegue aquele toque mágico. Há muitos jogos de basquetebol por aí, mas nenhum controlado através das mãos como em Mario Slam Basketball. Os jogadores utilizam o Ecrã Táctil para avançar no jogo enquanto executam dribles difíceis, passes especiais e lances suaves – tudo isto com pinceladas e toques do stylus. - Os jogadores escolhem as esquipas a partir de três personagens do universo do Mario e entram em campo. Power-ups como os dos Red Shells e dos Bob-ombs podem alterar tudo quando estes correm atrás de moedas – estas irão alterar a pontuação, por isso os jogadores apanham quantas puderem à medida que avançam para o cesto. Este jogo também está disponível em japonês.

RU.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
RU.description: Когда Марио забрасывает мяч, игра набирает новые необычные обороты! – Испробуйте магическое прикосновение. Существует большое количество баскетбольных игр, но ни одна из них не предлагает такую форму управления игрой как у игры Mario Slam Basketball. Игроки используют сенсорный дисплей для игры, выдавая хитроумные дриблинги, особые передачи и невероятные броски мяча — все это с помощью стилуса. – Каждый игрок выбирает себе команду из трех персонажей из вселенной Марио и отправляется прямиком на паркет. Такие усиления как Красные панцири и Дружищи Боб-омб, могут кардинально изменить ход игры, так как они гонятся за монетками для вас. Монетки влияют на счет игры, потому игрокам стоит собирать их побольше на пути к баскетбольному кольцу. Эта игра также поддерживает японский язык.

SE.name: Mario™ Slam Basketball
SE.description: It’s a whole new ball game as Mario rocks the rim! - Get that magic touch. There are plenty of basketball games out there, but none with the hands-on control of Mario Slam Basketball.
